articles.title: High BP while lying down linked to heart attack, stroke risk: Research - Sentinelassam - The Sentinel Assam
articles.description: People who had high blood pressure (BP) while lying flat on their backs had an increased risk of heart attack, stroke, heart failure or premature death, according to new research.
articles.content: NEW YORK: People who had high blood pressure (BP) while lying flat on their backs had an increased risk of heart attack, stroke, heart failure or premature death, according to new research. The study… [+2522 chars]
